Figure 4 presents the comparison between annual values of ELA and FLH obtained from ERA-interim reanalysis. There is a statistically significant linear relationship between the two variables, consistent with the similar linear relationship present over several other glaciers in the inner and outer tropical Andes

This relationship was subsequently used to project future changes in the ELA, using as input the FLH atm and FLH SST at QIC generated from CMIP5 historical and future scenarios. Calculated historical and future ELA’s from CMIP5 models were bias-corrected through comparison with the observed ELA during the period of overlap, 1992–2005 and 2006–2017 respectively.
